analyzed: vajrasattva mahāvajra vajranātha susādhaka
vajra abhiṣeka vajra ābha vajra ketu to namaḥ astu te  /
hāsa vajra mahā dharma vajra kośa mahā vara
sarva maṇḍala rāja agrya niṣprapañca namaḥ astu te  /
vajrakarma mahārakṣa caṇḍayakṣa mahāgraha
vajra muṣṭi mahā mudra sarva mudra namaḥ astu te
bodhi citta mahā bodhe buddha sarva tathāgata
vajrayāna mahājñāna mahāyāna namaḥ astu te  /
sarva artha sarva tattva artha mahāsattva artha sarva vid

original: sarvajña sarvakṛt sarva sarvadarśi namo'stu te || 5 ||
analyzed: sarvajña sarva kṛt sarva sarva darśi namaḥ astu te
vajra ātmaka su vajra agrya vajra vīrya su vajra dhṛk
mahā samaya tattva artha mahā satya namaḥ astu te
vajrāṅkuśa mahā kāma surate su mahā prabha
vajra prabha prabhā udyota buddha prabha namaḥ astu te
vajrarāja agrya vajra agrya vidyā agrya agrya narottama
vajra uttama mahā agrya agrya vidyā uttama namaḥ astu te
vajra dhāto mahā guhya vajra guhya su guhya dhṛk
vajra sūkṣma mahādhyāna vajra kārya namaḥ astu te  /
buddha agrya buddha vajra agrya buddha bodhe mahā budha
buddha jñāna mahābuddha buddha buddha namaḥ astu te
buddha pūjā mahā pūjā sattva pūjā su pūjaka
mahopāya mahāsiddhe vajrasiddhi namaḥ astu te
tathāgata mahākāya tathāgata sarasvate
tathāgata mahā citta vajra citta namaḥ astu te
buddha adhipa jina ājñā kṛt buddha mitra jina agraja
mahāvairocana vibho śānta raudra namaḥ astu te
tathāgata mahā tattva bhūtakoṭe mahānaya
sarva pāramitā jñāna parama artha namaḥ astu te  /
samantabhadra caryā agrya māra mārapramadarka
sarva agrya samatā jñāna sarvatraga namaḥ astu te  /
buddha huṃkara huṃkāra vajra huṃkara dāmaka
viśva vajra aḍga vajra ugra vajrapāṇe namaḥ astu te  /
vandayaḥ pūjyaḥ ca mānyaḥ ca satkartavyaḥ tathāgataiḥ
yasmāt vajra dṛḍham cittam vajra sattvaḥ tvam ucyase

original: tvadadhīnā hi saṃbodhiḥ pitā tvaṃ sarvadarśinām |
analyzed: tvad adhīnā hi saṃbodhiḥ pitā tvam sarva darśinām
saṃbhūtāḥ saṃbhaviṣyanti tvām āsādya tathāgatāḥ
anena stotra rājena yaḥ stuyāt bai su bhaktitaḥ
yaḥ gāyan tu stuyāt saḥ api bhavet vajradhara upamaḥ
adhyeṣayāmaḥ tvām nātha sarva buddha vaśaṃkaram
sarva sattva artha kārya artham utpādaya svakam kulam
mahā cakravarti nāma aṣṭottaraśata adhyeṣaṇā stotram sampūrṇam
